name: Invalid An inactive Staff creates and grades a new assignment

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets a POST Request to valid base URL and valid end point
When  User create a POST request to create and grade new assignment by an inactive staff from "POSTAssignment" and 10
Then  The response status code should be "404"
